mapper.insert: insert into satisfaction(seq, rating, dissatisfaction_content, write_date) values((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from satisfaction), #rating#, #dissatisfaction_content#, #write_date#)
mapper.update: update satisfaction set rating=#rating#, dissatisfaction_content=#dissatisfaction_content#, write_date=#write_date# where seq=#seq#
mapper.select: select * from satisfaction order by seq desc
